author: DarwinJS
body:
@joeyaiello - in the community call someone was talking about homebrew and it sounded like they might know the steps to get PowerShell Core and VS Code installed using homebrew.

Could anyone who knows how to do this please post the script code bits to this issue so I can add them to install-powershell.sh ?
title: Need OSX install bash commands for installing PowerShell and VSCode using Homebrew
